definition: Guinness (name)
lucky/giga- (meaning billion or 10^9)
surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
(phonetic)/this
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: McGuinness says he hardly needs to spell out what has happened to Kiko in the last year.
sentences.chinese: 麥吉尼斯說他不用多說去年馬切達的表現。

sentences.english: In 1991, Guinness received an Honorary Doctorate from Cambridge University.
sentences.chinese: 1991年吉尼斯獲得劍橋大學名譽博士學位。

sentences.english: The lake and dam have been listed in Gunness Book of World Records.
sentences.chinese: 湖壩已被列入《吉尼斯世界大全》。

sentences.english: Eastman and Guinness were at opposite extremes on the scale of disconfirmation .
sentences.chinese: 伊斯曼與吉尼斯處於極端對立的規模整合。

sentences.english: They are now preparing to apply for a Guinness record.
sentences.chinese: 紫金繡莊目前正準備爲這面黨旗申報吉尼斯世界紀錄。

sentences.english: Now Sheila and the catfish are all collected in Guinness World Records.
sentences.chinese: 希拉和這條魚目前都被收錄進《吉尼斯世界紀錄》。

sentences.english: He measures about 56cm and is currently recognized by Guinness as the shortest living teenager.
sentences.chinese: 馬嘉爾現在是吉尼斯“最矮青少年”紀錄保持者。

sentences.english: "Why don't you order a Guinness ?" his counterparts ask.
sentences.chinese: “你幹嗎不點‘吉尼斯’啤酒呀？”他的同行問道。

sentences.english: It took 26 video tapes to submit to Guinness.
sentences.chinese: 他遞交給吉尼斯的錄像帶就有26盤。

sentences.english: And her Lulu Guinness clutch is, er, white on black.
sentences.chinese: 而且她的露露吉尼斯緊身衣是，呃，黑底白條的。

sentences.english: Both Jordan siblings feature in the Guinness World Records 2012.
sentences.chinese: 姐弟倆都將出現在2012年吉尼斯世界紀錄上。

sentences.english: Guinness, Kilkenny and much more on tap.
sentences.chinese: 吉尼斯世界紀錄，基爾肯尼和更多的挖掘。

sentences.english: This is Strati's fourth attempt to enter the Guinness World Record.
sentences.chinese: 這是斯特拉蒂第四次試圖進入吉尼斯世界紀錄。

sentences.english: This bar has Guinness beer on draught.
sentences.chinese: 這間酒吧有桶裝的吉尼斯黑生啤。

sentences.english: The Guiness World Records organization has approved it as the largest human smiley.
sentences.chinese: 吉尼斯世界組織已經批准它成爲最大的人體笑臉。

sentences.english: Andrea: Or a crisp glass of white wine.
sentences.chinese: 是想喝一杯吉尼斯黑啤還是純生啤酒。

definition: world record
variant of 記錄|记录[ji4 lu4] (but in Taiwan, not for the verb sense "to record")
ranked number one in the world/the world's first
in history
slacklining
ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
to set a record
to break a record/record-breaking
gold medal/first prize
laurel/victory garland (in Greek and Western culture)
to continue in a post/(to hold a post) several times in succession/(to win a title) in successive years/to stay at number one/to defend a championship
grand slam
International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. for 國際田徑聯合會|国际田径联合会[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4]
UNESCO, United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Jiao4 Ke1 Wen2 Zu3 zhi1

definition: International Association of Athletics Federations (IAAF)/abbr. to 國際田聯|国际田联[Guo2 ji4 Tian2 Lian2]
pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Tian2 jing4 Lian2 he2 hui4

definition: solitaire (puzzle)
